reviews.review_msg: very bad prof, zero organization and is extremely unfreindly and pretentious. glad its over...

Hard to understand, breaks out in Spanish, unhelpful... assumes you already know the history of certain topics.... unfriendly. I will avoid taking her classes as much as possible, although this is difficult as the Spanish/LAS dept. is very small.

Talks too fast & won't allow interruptions.This is a big problem as she has a very strong accent that makes it difficult to understand quite a number of her words.Too much material to needs to be covered.Really should not be a 100 level course.

Interesting content and videos, but thought Monica could have communicated the material more effectively. With a different prof this class could have been so much better. She was helpful outside of class, just thought lectures were slightly disorganized. A lot of content to memorize!
I loved this class. A lot of critical thinking and discussion. This course provided a lot of information. It makes me sad that this class will not be offered again.
The material covered in class was very interesting and movies shown in class were also great. But the proffesor expects way too much and there is also an excessive amount of reading material.
Excessive reading...very tough marker...Monica expects way too much.  She is also kind of stubborn but very helpful if you see her during office hours.
Very good professor.  Very interested in the topic.  Friendly, flexible, accessible and encourages discussion.  Course was very valuable and she made it very interesting.  Loved the movies!!!

She is a very knowledgeable proffesor, sometimes uses Spanish word in her lecture, but you don't need to know it. Need to do reading for the course, the you will be fine. Very interesting course, Easy to get B. Difficult to get A. She is bias somestimes.
Very fair, helpful. Was very accomodating to me as a part-time student who works a full-time job with help via email when I couldn't make it to class.
Interesting class. Be prepared to carry tape recorder during the lecture coz she speaks like a rapper with THICK spanish accent!
Terrible... didn't teach anything that was on her exams!!! and she always slips into spanish! be careful! brutal.
AWFUL! If you're not fluent in Spanish don't wate your time. She'll hate you.
